name: Lady Mermalade's Flippy Fins
description: Lady Mermalade is the queen of the seven seas. As she longed to oversee the kingdom, the reigness decided to take a swim into the deep. It was not long before things got really fishy... Out of the blue a huge,  evil, nasty and moreover hungry shark started chasing Mermalade all over the ocean floor. Can you help to save the day ? Ask your fishy subjects for help and escape the shark !
